revised_title: High-Power Neodymium Glass Laser Systems for Fusion Research
tldr: The article discusses the development and performance of high-power neodymium glass laser systems for fusion research. The author describes the construction of various glass laser systems, including Gekko II, Gekko IV, and modules of Gekko XII, and their applications in fusion research. The article also highlights the importance of laser glass, optical components, and system performance in experimental work. The author presents experimental results and discusses the scientific feasibility of inertial confinement fusion.
